channel.title: Talks on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Academic

item.title: Texas A&M EEB
item.description: Talk on Sept 7, 2015, on “Dealing with the heterogeneity of life for comparative methods” to the EEB interdisciplinary program at Texas A&M; my hosts were Michelle Lawing and Claudio Casola. Work highlighted included Brownie, OUwie, hisse, FaMUSSE, and corhmm. The relevant papers can be seen at Google Scholar. Talk as PDF: 2015ix7_TexasAM.pdf
